title: IBM Full-Stack Software Developer Professional Certificate
desc: I have completed 10 courses on various Application Development and Cloud technologies and am equipped with the skills and know how to undertake challenges of Developing Cloud Native Applications. I have hands-on working knowledge with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, GitHub, Node.js, React, Cloud Native practices, DevOps, CI/CD, Containers, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, Python programming, Databases, SQL, NoSQL, Django ORM, Bootstrap, Application Security, Microservices, Serverless computing, and more. I have also deployed several applications on cloud, completed a capstone project, and delivered a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution using Cloud Native methodologies.
